trans-unit.source: Working with the ATA Console | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: Working with the ATA Console | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Describes how to log into the ATA console and the components of the console
trans-unit.target: Describes how to log into the ATA console and the components of the console

trans-unit.source: *Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7*
trans-unit.target: *Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7*

trans-unit.source: Working with the ATA Console
trans-unit.target: Working with the ATA Console

trans-unit.source: Use the ATA console to monitor and respond to suspicious activity detected by ATA.
trans-unit.target: Use the ATA console to monitor and respond to suspicious activity detected by ATA.

trans-unit.source: Enabling access to the ATA Console
trans-unit.target: Enabling access to the ATA Console

trans-unit.source: To successfully login to the ATA Console, you have to log in with a user who was assigned the proper ATA role to access the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: To successfully login to the ATA Console, you have to log in with a user who was assigned the proper ATA role to access the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: For more information about role based access control (RBAC) in ATA, see [Working with ATA role groups](ata-role-groups.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about role based access control (RBAC) in ATA, see [Working with ATA role groups](ata-role-groups.md).

trans-unit.source: Logging into the ATA Console
trans-unit.target: Logging into the ATA Console

trans-unit.source: In the ATA Center server, click the **Microsoft ATA Console** icon on the desktop or open a browser and browse to the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: In the ATA Center server, click the **Microsoft ATA Console** icon on the desktop or open a browser and browse to the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: ATA server icon
trans-unit.target: ATA server icon

trans-unit.source: You can also open a browser from either the ATA Center or the ATA Gateway and browse to the IP address you configured in the ATA Center installation for the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: You can also open a browser from either the ATA Center or the ATA Gateway and browse to the IP address you configured in the ATA Center installation for the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: Enter your username and password and click **Log in**.
trans-unit.target: Enter your username and password and click **Log in**.

trans-unit.source: ATA login screen image
trans-unit.target: ATA login screen image

trans-unit.source: The ATA Console
trans-unit.target: The ATA Console

trans-unit.source: The ATA Console provides you a quick view of all suspicious activities in chronological order.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Console provides you a quick view of all suspicious activities in chronological order.

trans-unit.source: It enables you to drill into details of any activity and perform actions based on those activities.
trans-unit.target: It enables you to drill into details of any activity and perform actions based on those activities.

trans-unit.source: The console also displays alerts and notifications to highlight problems with the ATA network or new activities that are deemed suspicious.
trans-unit.target: The console also displays alerts and notifications to highlight problems with the ATA network or new activities that are deemed suspicious.

trans-unit.source: These are the key elements of the ATA console.
trans-unit.target: These are the key elements of the ATA console.

trans-unit.source: Attack time line
trans-unit.target: Attack time line

trans-unit.source: This is the default landing page you are taken to when you log in to the ATA Console.
trans-unit.target: This is the default landing page you are taken to when you log in to the ATA Console.

trans-unit.source: By default, all open suspicious activities are shown on the attack time line.
trans-unit.target: By default, all open suspicious activities are shown on the attack time line.

trans-unit.source: You can filter the attack time line to show All, Open, Dismissed or Resolved suspicious activities.
trans-unit.target: You can filter the attack time line to show All, Open, Dismissed or Resolved suspicious activities.

trans-unit.source: You can also see the severity assigned to each activity.
trans-unit.target: You can also see the severity assigned to each activity.

trans-unit.source: ATA attack timeline image
trans-unit.target: ATA attack timeline image

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with suspicious activities](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/working-with-suspicious-activities).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Working with suspicious activities](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/working-with-suspicious-activities).

trans-unit.source: Notification bar
trans-unit.target: Notification bar

trans-unit.source: When a new suspicious activity is detected, the notification bar will open automatically on the right hand side.
trans-unit.target: When a new suspicious activity is detected, the notification bar will open automatically on the right hand side.

trans-unit.source: If there are new suspicious activities since the last time you logged in, the notification bar will open after you have successfully logged in.
trans-unit.target: If there are new suspicious activities since the last time you logged in, the notification bar will open after you have successfully logged in.

trans-unit.source: You can click the arrow on the right at any time to access the notification bar.
trans-unit.target: You can click the arrow on the right at any time to access the notification bar.

trans-unit.source: ATA notification bar image
trans-unit.target: ATA notification bar image

trans-unit.source: Filtering panel
trans-unit.target: Filtering panel

trans-unit.source: You can filter which suspicious activities are displayed in the attack time line or displayed in the entity profile suspicious activities tab based on Status and Severity.
trans-unit.target: You can filter which suspicious activities are displayed in the attack time line or displayed in the entity profile suspicious activities tab based on Status and Severity.

trans-unit.source: Search bar
trans-unit.target: Search bar

trans-unit.source: In the top menu, you will find a search bar.
trans-unit.target: In the top menu, you will find a search bar.

trans-unit.source: You can search for a specific user, computer or groups in ATA.
trans-unit.target: You can search for a specific user, computer or groups in ATA.

trans-unit.source: To give it a try, just start typing.
trans-unit.target: To give it a try, just start typing.

trans-unit.source: ATA console search image
trans-unit.target: ATA console search image

trans-unit.source: Health Center
trans-unit.target: Health Center

trans-unit.source: The Health Center provides you with alerts when something isn't working properly in your ATA deployment.
trans-unit.target: The Health Center provides you with alerts when something isn't working properly in your ATA deployment.

trans-unit.source: ATA health center image
trans-unit.target: ATA health center image

trans-unit.source: Any time your system encounters a problem, such as a connectivity error or a disconnected ATA Gateway, the Health Center icon will let you know by displaying a red dot.
trans-unit.target: Any time your system encounters a problem, such as a connectivity error or a disconnected ATA Gateway, the Health Center icon will let you know by displaying a red dot.

trans-unit.source: ATA health center red dot image
trans-unit.target: ATA health center red dot image

trans-unit.source: Health Center alerts can be dismissed or resolved and are categorized High, Medium or Low depending on their severity.
trans-unit.target: Health Center alerts can be dismissed or resolved and are categorized High, Medium or Low depending on their severity.

trans-unit.source: If you resolve an alert that the ATA service detects as still active, it will automatically be moved to the Open list of alerts.
trans-unit.target: If you resolve an alert that the ATA service detects as still active, it will automatically be moved to the Open list of alerts.

trans-unit.source: If the system detects that there is no longer cause for an alert (the situation has been fixed), it will automatically be moved to the resolved list.
trans-unit.target: If the system detects that there is no longer cause for an alert (the situation has been fixed), it will automatically be moved to the resolved list.

trans-unit.source: User and computer profiles
trans-unit.target: User and computer profiles

trans-unit.source: ATA builds a profile for each user and computer in the network.
trans-unit.target: ATA builds a profile for each user and computer in the network.

trans-unit.source: In the user profile ATA displays general information, such as group membership, recent logins, and recently accessed resources.
trans-unit.target: In the user profile ATA displays general information, such as group membership, recent logins, and recently accessed resources.

trans-unit.source: User profile
trans-unit.target: User profile

trans-unit.source: In the computer profile, ATA displays general information, such as recently logins and recently accessed resources.
trans-unit.target: In the computer profile, ATA displays general information, such as recently logins and recently accessed resources.

trans-unit.source: Computer profile
trans-unit.target: Computer profile

trans-unit.source: ATA provides additional information about entities (computers, devices, users) on the following pages: Summary, Activities, and Suspicious activities.
trans-unit.target: ATA provides additional information about entities (computers, devices, users) on the following pages: Summary, Activities, and Suspicious activities.

trans-unit.source: A profile that ATA has not been able to fully resolve will be identified with half-filled circle icon next to it.
trans-unit.target: A profile that ATA has not been able to fully resolve will be identified with half-filled circle icon next to it.

trans-unit.source: ATA unresolved profile image
trans-unit.target: ATA unresolved profile image

trans-unit.source: Mini profile
trans-unit.target: Mini profile

trans-unit.source: Anywhere in the console where there is a single entity presented, such as a user or computer, if you hover your mouse over the entity, a mini profile will automatically open displaying the following information if available:
trans-unit.target: Anywhere in the console where there is a single entity presented, such as a user or computer, if you hover your mouse over the entity, a mini profile will automatically open displaying the following information if available:

trans-unit.source: ATA mini profile image
trans-unit.target: ATA mini profile image

trans-unit.target: Picture

trans-unit.target: Email
